The claim was made by Terry McAuliffe: the Democratic gubernatorial nominee, during a campaign rally at the Hippodrome Theater in Jackson Ward.
McAuliffe: s campaign provided evidence in the form of a comment made by Ken Cuccinelli, the Republican gubernatorial candidate, at a February 2012 rally supporting personhood legislation.
